segments.text: Oh no, this is not good at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and the woman doesn't even realize it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring onto the floor, making a big mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the kids, they're climbing on that stool, it's so dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the stool is unstable, and they could fall at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for her, she's going to be in for a surprise when she turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching now, trying to reach the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting below, hoping to get a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope everyone stays safe and no one gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is really hard to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
